channel.title: Spyder-Scape (Work in Progress!) Take a look!
channel.description:
Welcome to Spyder-Scape! Spyder-Scape is a 317 source with many thing's to do. I'll list some of the commands and features it has under. It has its own client.
[u]Source[/u] - JVM Company
[b]Commands -[/b] ::pickup ::jail ::unjail ::ardy (added) ::lumbridge (added) ::varrock (added) ::barrage (added) ::alchs (added) ::pctime ::firecape (gives guide) ::arrows ::food ::pots (added) ::pass (change pass) [IMG]http://i389.photobucket.com/albums/oo336/doodoohead395/commands.jpg[/img]
[b]Features -[/b] Barrows with all working drops. [IMG]http://i389.photobucket.com/albums/oo336/doodoohead395/barrows.jpg[/img]
Pest control with rewards - [IMG]http://i389.photobucket.com/albums/oo336/doodoohead395/PESTCONTROL.jpg[/img]
Assault with rewards - [IMG]http://i389.photobucket.com/albums/oo336/doodoohead395/ASSALT.jpg[/img]
Fight pits - [IMG]http://i389.photobucket.com/albums/oo336/doodoohead395/FIGHTPITS.jpg[/img]
Godwars, 20 kills get you to boss - [IMG]http://i389.photobucket.com/albums/oo336/doodoohead395/godwars.jpg[/img]
Pking - [IMG]http://i389.photobucket.com/albums/oo336/doodoohead395/pk.jpg[/img]
Dh hitting - [IMG]http://i389.photobucket.com/albums/oo336/doodoohead395/Max.jpg[/img]
Teleports - [IMG]http://i389.photobucket.com/albums/oo336/doodoohead395/teleports.jpg[/img]
I fixed the shops and added more to them because well they sucked, now they are good. Perfect Teleporting & High alching. Perfect Achient & Lunar. Working d bow with correct special. Correct God swords with correct specials. 80% of skills work. Perfect Following Jad waves (7) D claws with special. Guthans works perfect.
Adding - *Castle Wars *Pvp system *Some sort of Grand Exchange *Clan chat
Tell me what you think of it, its not all complete yet but its a work in progress, please rate on 0/10 - 10/10.

@Owner_Spyder wrote:

Welcome to Spyder-Scape!
Spyder-Scape is a 317 source with many thing’s to do. I’ll list some of the commands and features it has under. It has its own client.

Source - JVM Company

Commands -
::pickup
::jail
::unjail
::ardy (added)
::lumbridge (added)
::varrock (added)
::barrage (added)
::alchs (added)
::pctime
::firecape (gives guide)
::arrows
::food
::pots (added)
::pass (change pass)

Features -
Barrows with all working drops.

Pest control with rewards -

Assault with rewards -

Fight pits -

Godwars, 20 kills get you to boss -

Pking -

Dh hitting -

Teleports -

I fixed the shops and added more to them because well they sucked, now they are good.
Perfect Teleporting & High alching.
Perfect Achient & Lunar.
Working d bow with correct special.
Correct God swords with correct specials.
80% of skills work.
Perfect Following
Jad waves (7)
D claws with special.
Guthans works perfect.

Adding -
*Castle Wars
*Pvp system
*Some sort of Grand Exchange
*Clan chat

Tell me what you think of it, its not all complete yet but its a work in progress, please rate on 0/10 - 10/10.
